author: newsr.in
title: Starbucks Android app now lets you place your order before you reach the store - newsR
text: If you haven’t got time to stand around in a Starbucks queue to place your order, the good news is that you no longer have to. The company, which first allowed iPhone users to place orders on the mobile app before reaching the store, has now added the same functionality to the Android app … The company […] »
